name: MetaSafe Network - Developed With Harmony & Based on Ethereum
deliverables: Anyone Can Develop Apps On MetaSafe’s Open Source Blockchain. The MetaSafe Blockchain is planned to be an open source project, allowing anyone to develop Web 3.0 applications

Earn Rewards for Supporting Decentralized Privacy. By joining the MetaSafe network, you help everyone in the MetaSafe network—both GRYPHON owners and app subscribers—protect their privacy. As a reward, 70% of MetaSafe’s App subscription fees will be redistributed back to the network.

Power the Future of Cybersecurity As A MetaSafe Miner. The MetaSafe blockchain is powered by thousands of GRYPHON routers. By owning one of these routers, you make decentralized privacy a reality for yourself and everyone around the world.

name: Implementing blockchain technology in cloud storage
deliverables: Creating online and downloadable platform
Creating an ICO and developing a coin for payments to the miners and getting it listed on all major exchanges
Creating our servers and buying all the necessary equipment
Marketing
Revolutionising the cloud storage conception

name: So how do you become a Blockchain pioneer?
deliverables: JSON - stands for JavaScript Object Notation and it’s a data format
Ganache - allows to fire up a personal Ethereum blockchain which you can use to run tests, execute commands, and inspect state while controlling how the chain operates
Postman - the most complete toolchain for API development
MyEtherWallet - an open source tool for generating Ethererum Wallets & sending transactions
Remix - the most popular and user-friendly Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for Solidity

Anaconda - an open source distribution of the Python and R programming languages for large-scale data processing, predictive analytics, and scientific computing, that aims to simplify package management and deployment
Flask - a micro web development framework for Python
Spyder - a powerful Python IDE with advanced editing and features

name: Cryptocurrency mining on a badge?
deliverables: It's not a centralized blockchain like bitcoin but instead a distributed tree of interactions
It operates on collaborative proof of work proving interactions are authentic
It runs on sneakernet instead of the interwebs
